# Copilot Instructions for terratone

## Project Protocol
- Safety-critical, modular architecture
- Documentation and code traceability
- Hardware, software, and regulatory compliance
- Comprehensive test coverage

## Project Checklist
- [ ] All directories and stubs created
- [ ] README, LICENSE, docs populated
- [ ] Regulatory headers in all code
- [ ] All boundaries and safety patterns enforced
- [ ] All code and docs traceable to requirements
